Japanese female voice for SVOX Classic text-to-speech engine.
Did you know that your mobile can speak Japanese?
Have Misaki read aloud texts from your e-book, navigation, translation and other apps in a Japanese female, high quality and natural-sounding voice powered by SVOX.
When combined with TTS-enabled apps, Misaki can:
- give directions, allowing you to keep your eyes on the road while you're driving 
- read a notification containing the caller / sender's name, and read the content of an incoming call / sms / mms / email
- read aloud your favorite e-books or pdf documents
- help you learn Japanese by reading aloud the correct pronunciation
and much moreÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ the possibilities are limitless!
